page.title: 03Family life at weekends
page.content: Most weekends me and my brother go swimming with my dad.When I get home I have a drink of coffee some times.I go out on my{BMX 2000 bike with Neil and Richard in the swing park.When they have to go in I play with the football with my brother.Then my mum calls me in for dinner. After I have had my dinner I help do the garden. Dad lets me put stones in the dustbin. It is very sad when people leave. {My friend called Julie}was very nice and at Christmas when I was a 2nd year she left because her dad was in the army. He got an army posting which meant he had to go to Hong Kong. I did'nt want her to leave as she was my best friend. I was very sad when she left but we still like to write to each other. {
